sub_title: Exams invigilator British School Of the Netherlands
summary:
Experienced professional with a demonstrated history of working in the individual and family services industry. Skilled in Communication, Organizational Commitment, Responsiveness, Management, and Team Organisation. Results oriented, always in search of new challenges. Customer satisfaction a priority in all my fields.
Strong education professional graduated from Università Cattolica of Milan And Nijmegen Universiteit in The Netherlands (master in law and canonic law), with a great and true passion for human rights and education. Social studies at American University of Kuwait and The Hague Academy of law. 
Life is a never ending learning journey, I love to explore cultures, languages and procedures, supporting humans feeling at home.
Parenting and schooling coach.

profile_positions.description: Welcome ambassador at International Schools, welcoming new parents and building communities on schools' environment. Curriculum advisor IB (PYP, IPC, MYP, DP), American, Steiner and Montessori. Supporting new families relocating happily and finding their place in the community. Active volunteer in all school events, creation of workshops and information materials. Liaison parent for Italian, Spanish, South American and French families.
profile_positions.title: Welcome Ambassador

profile_positions.location: The Netherlands, France, Kuwait, Emirates, Italy
profile_positions.description: In person and remote teaching of Italian language, both for native and not native. Literature and Language acquisition, adapting learning experience to candidates and students. IB tutor for Italian B in international school, Italian business for professional.
profile_positions.title: Teacher of foreign language (Italian) and Italian culture promoter

profile_positions.description: Child Protection and Gender Based Violence policy advisor. Reporting and mapping, OCHA and UNICEF meeting reports about Ukraine war crisis and Polish refugees camps. Support in training volunteers and fundraising for mission on site.

profile_positions.description: Volunteer project support for homeless dinner, clothes and food collection and distribution, on site (refugees and homeless camps, in different location, mainly Porte de La Chapelle in Paris). Organization of a consultant service to apply to refugees status for asylum seekers, language (French) free courses, legal counselor.
profile_positions.title: Social worker homeless and refugees

profile_positions.description: I coordinate a group of volunteers creating extra curricular activities about Italian language and culture. I plan lessons and create tailor made contents and materials, adapting them to British School of Paris lower school pupils (5 to 11 years old), natives or not. Group of 12 pupils for both level (Italian A and Italian B). I trained volunteers and planned lessons, with regular meeting and follow ups, in strict coordination with school administration.
profile_positions.title: Italian Instructor and Volunteers coordinator for Italian Club as Extra Curricular Activity

profile_positions.description: Greeting and supporting of new mom to be and new parents in town in all parenting topics. Planning of festive events and activities, including regular meetings. Hosting workshop with experts (health, school, environment, etc). Fundraising and charity sales. Local area coordinator and community builder.
profile_positions.title: Motherhood and parenting volunteer

company.name: Istitute de pedagogie curative de Chatou

profile_positions.company: Istitute de pedagogie curative de Chatou
profile_positions.description: Internship experience as SEND teacher assistant in the special context of a Steiner Waldorf school dedicated at special need children (trisomy 21 disorder, autism spectrum, genetic complex disorders) education. Teaching experience in grade 3/Y4/CE2 class and kindergarten (4 to 7 years old). Steiner curriculum for primary, integrated by specific program for special need children as eurythmic and art as therapy lessons, Makaton language for non verbal students. Teaching and training of daily routine children chores to promote pupils autonomy (daily life basics and social skills). I was part of pedagogical team to support children curriculum and portfolio.
profile_positions.title: Teacher Assistant Special Need Children

company.name: Kuwait Association for the care of children in hospital

profile_positions.description: Hosting of play and art sessions for young patients in city hospitals provided by the foundation to ease recovery and entertain children during hospitalization. Observing religious (muslim), privacy and hygiene rules. Team work session with physiotherapists and medical staff. Family support and event planning for major muslim festivals, full recovery parties and birthdays.
profile_positions.title: Ludotherapist and art therapist for young patients and children at hospital

volunteer_experiences.description: Message Paris is a no profit organisation that support maternity and parenting of Parisian anglophone community of moms and children. Italian group support bilingual family in raising their children, taking alive Italian language and culture through regular meeting and events, managed, planned and run by the coordinator.

company.name: Love in a box American Cathedral of Paris

volunteer_experiences.description: Love in a box association collect basic items and gift for disfavoured children and moms in Paris. Our role is check donations and prepare delivery to our partners (Armee de la Salut, H.O.M.E., Croix rouge, Samu).
